description:
We’re local with over 40 years of experience and we’ve collected millions for our injured clients! Call us 24/7 for your free case evaluation.

A nationally recognized attorney, Flora Templeton Stuart was the first female attorney to litigate cases in Southcentral Kentucky. Shewas appointed Public Advocate of Warren County with extensive trial experience including national recognition on Good Morning America and Time Magazine.

Unique to a major law firm, Ms. Stuart personally oversees her cases, which include automobile accidents, semi-truck accidents, and personal injuries. She has been recognized as a Top 10 Trucking Trial Lawyer, Top 100 National Trial Lawyer, and was voted ‘Best of Bowling Green’ by the BG Daily News.

Ms. Stuart has obtained multi-million dollar settlements for her injured clients. She travels to injured clients and is available 24/7. No fee is charged unless she wins your case.

Community service is the cornerstone of the Law Office of Flora Templeton Stuart. Making a difference in the lives of others through service is exemplified in her practice. Through her partnership with WBKO, Flora created Poppy’s Field Trip and the Today’s Leader award which recognizes students and educators in our region who have made a positive impact on their community. She founded multiple organizations and events aimed at educating and benefiting community members, including Band Together BG and BG OnStage. She is president of the Bowling Green Noon Lions Club and is a major sponsor for Toys for Tots, Stuff the Bus, Kentucky Veteran’s Brigade, Thunderfest with the Kiwanis Club and numerous community service activities. Ms. Stuart is a member of the Holy Spirit Church Choir.
